column6: A SECOND COMING TIE-IN! Part 3 of 3  At last! All the members of X-Factor are reunited in this climactic, slam-bang X-plosion of a conclusion as Trask decides to take matters into his own hands and personally direct the forces of the Mutant Response Division into a full blown war against everyone's favorite mutant detective team!   Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:Valentine De Landro | penciller:David Yardin
